entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
